us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream
Class HL7IOException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7IOException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class HL7IOException
extends java.io.IOException

An exception class for HL7 message streams.

See Also:

static int FILE_IO_ERROR
          A file i/o error occurred.
static int FILE_NOT_FOUND
          The file towards whcih the offending operation was directed, was not found.
static int HL7_NACK
          HL7 transaction was rejected with a NAck message.
static int INAPPROPRIATE_DIRECTIVE
          An attempt was made to perform an operation inconsistent with the access characteristics of the context stream.
static int INAPPROPRIATE_OPERATION
          The call causing this exception requested an operation which is inconsistent with the characterisitics of the context stream.
static int INCONSISTENT_STATE
          The stream was in an inconsistent state at the time of the call.
static int IO_EXCEPTION
          A general IO exception was thrown.
static int NO_ERROR
          No error.
static int NO_MSG_TYPE
          An attempt was made to operate on a HL7 message which had no type defined.
static int NULL_MSG
          An attempt was made to operate on a null message reference.
static int NULL_STREAM
          An attempt was made to operate on a null stream reference.
static int STREAM_CLOSED
          The stream was closed at the time of the call.
static int UNINTERPERABLE_URI
          A URI parameter was not interperable within the context of the stream.
static int UNKNOWN_HOST
          A specified host was not found.
static int UNSPECIFIED_ERROR
          Unspecified (or unknown) error.
static int WRONG_CTLID
          An attempt was made to operate on an incorrectly identified HL7 message.

INAPPROPRIATE_DIRECTIVE

public static final int INAPPROPRIATE_DIRECTIVE
An attempt was made to perform an operation inconsistent with the access characteristics of the context stream. ie; read from a writer or write to a reader.
